rows.label: qst104227_msg0001
rows.name:
All right, now I'm going to show
you all how a pro salvager works,
so pay close attention!

rows.label: qst104227_msg0002
rows.name:
You all don't have any salvaging
gear yet, so we can't let you try
it out for yourselves today...

rows.label: qst104227_msg0003
rows.name:
But watching how it's done will
prepare you for when you do
start salvaging for yourselves!

rows.label: qst104227_msg0004
rows.name:
I've never seen a real salvager
at work before!

rows.label: qst104227_msg0005
rows.name:
Aren't those air cylinder things heavy?
Won't you just sink?

rows.label: qst104227_msg0006
rows.name: Bring us back lots of treasure, Rex-sensei!

rows.label: qst104227_msg0007
rows.name: Sure thing! Leave it to me!
